name: The Clearing of Wretchhold
description:
Play through 7 levels of this retro-inspired, turn-based, grid-based dungeon crawler. Talk to townfolk, navigate the forests, enter the fortress of Wretchhold, and try to clear it of it's inhabitants as a warrior. Then return as a druid to clear the subsequent bad karma.

Made in a week for Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023

Credits

  • Sound Design - Bann
  • Writing, Game Design - Charley Rand
  • Music - Griffin d'Audiffret
  • Level Design - Frankee
  • Voice Acting - Langi Tuifua
  • Programming, UI, Level Design - Luke
  • Assets
    • Art - Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup
    • Sound Effects - NEXTALE Sound Effects Library
    • Framework - Dungeon Boots, using Three js and Howler js
